name: heart-stamp
caption: Heart Stamp

effect.short: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a 30% chance to make the target []{mechanic:flinch}.

flavorText:
The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act
makes the target less wary. This may also make the
target flinch.
